# Elastic Beanstalk 

## Elastic Load Balancer
"single-instance" environments can be configured in "load-balancing environment" configurations.

## Application log accss from 

```bash
.ebextensions
   applog.config
```


```bash
files:
  "/opt/python/log/application.log" :
   mode: "000666"
   owner: ec2-user
   group: ec2-user
   content: |
       # Askbot log file
```
